org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.viewport

Class StretchViewport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.viewport.Viewport
      • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.viewport.ScalingViewport
        • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.viewport.StretchViewport

  • public class StretchViewport
extends ScalingViewport
    A Viewport with a fixed size that is stretched to fill the game window. The aspect ratio is not maintained.
